name: Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio project built with Angular. Take a look and let me know what you think :)

name: Star Tech
description: This Angular application aims to create a quiz to raise awareness about the effects of climate change. It was developed in 48h to participate in the NASA Space Apps Challenge Hackathon

name: Gif App
description: Application to display GIFs using a search engine. It is developed with React, Vite, and JavaScript.

name: FIFA
description: Angular app showcasing the lowest-ranked players in the FIFA ranking. Developed as a practice project for Vueling University with my teammate Ignasi Gurrea.

name: FCB Stats
description: Angular application developed to display the roster and statistics of FC Barcelona's first team. Developed as a practice project for Vueling University.

name: Matchday
description: A personal project that I initially completed to finish my frontend studies. I decided to start it over from scratch to improve upon aspects I hadn’t considered before, such as SOLID Principles or Clean Code, and it is currently in development.

name: Matchday - Backend
description: This REST API, developed with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize to connect to MariaDB. It is currently in development.

name: ITA Challenges
description: ITA Challenges, an open-source project I participated in with a team of nine people. It’s an application designed for students to access programming challenges and track their progress to improve their skills.

name: Starwars
description: This Angular application connects to the Star Wars API and provides user authentication and registration functionalities using Guards.
